events.message: I received the wrong size for the jacket I ordered and would like to request a refund since the item doesn't fit.
The issue is categorized as a refund request because the customer wants their money back due to receiving an incorrect size.
The support ticket has been assigned to agent Clara M. to handle the refund request for the wrong size jacket.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like a refund for the jacket you received in the wrong size. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the jacket showing the size label so we can verify the error?
Sure, my order number is #456789 and I have attached a photo showing the size label as requested.
Thank you for the information. I have processed your refund, and you should see the amount credited back to your original payment method within 5 business days.
I appreciate your quick response and the refund processed so fast. Thanks for resolving this issue.
The refund case has been marked as resolved after confirming the payment reversal and customer satisfaction.
Following up to ensure that you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with the resolution provided.
The refund case has been closed following confirmation that the issue was resolved to your satisfaction. Thank you for contacting support.
